speakers.name: Sergey Brin
speakers.title: Co-Founder
speakers.bio: Co-founder of Google with Larry Page; developed PageRank algorithm; President of Alphabet until 2019; net worth $150B+; PhD Stanford (on leave); currently working hands-on at Google on AI projects
notable_achievements: One of the wealthiest people in the world

speakers.name: Chris Lattner
speakers.title: Co-Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Created LLVM (foundation of most modern compilers); created Swift at Apple; created Clang; founded Modular AI and Mojo language ($350M raised); former Tesla Autopilot, Google Brain; PhD UIUC
notable_achievements: Created LLVM (25 years, powers most compilers)
Created Swift programming language at Apple
Founded Modular AI, created Mojo language

speakers.name: Alec Radford
speakers.title: Independent Researcher
speakers.bio: First author of GPT-1 and GPT-2; co-created CLIP and Whisper at OpenAI; joined OpenAI in 2016; cited 322K+ times; left OpenAI Dec 2024 to pursue independent research; advisor to Thinking Machines Lab
notable_achievements: First author of GPT-1 and GPT-2

speakers.name: Sebastian Thrun
speakers.title: Founder
speakers.bio: Father of the modern self-driving car; founded Google X, Waymo (Google self-driving car), and Google Street View; founded Udacity (acquired by Accenture); won DARPA Grand Challenge 2005 with Stanley; co-founded Kitty Hawk with Larry Page; former Stanford AI Lab director

speakers.name: Aravind Srinivas
speakers.title: Co-Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Co-founder & CEO of Perplexity AI ($20B valuation, 780M queries/month); former researcher at OpenAI, Google Brain, DeepMind; PhD UC Berkeley; rejected Meta acquisition offer; Cristiano Ronaldo investor

speakers.name: George Hotz
speakers.title: CEO
speakers.bio: First to jailbreak iPhone; first to hack PS3 (sued by Sony); founded comma.ai (autonomous driving); founded tiny corp and tinygrad (neural network framework); building tinybox ($15K AI computer); mission to 'commoditize the petaflop'

speakers.name: John Schulman
speakers.title: Chief Scientist
speakers.bio: OpenAI co-founder; invented PPO (Proximal Policy Optimization) - backbone of RLHF; called 'architect of ChatGPT'; led RL team that created ChatGPT; co-founded Thinking Machines Lab with Mira Murati; PhD UC Berkeley under Pieter Abbeel

speakers.name: Eric Schmidt
speakers.title: CEO
speakers.bio: Former CEO & Chairman of Google (2001-2017), built Google from startup to one of world's most valuable companies; Chairman of US National Security Commission on AI; Chairman of SandboxAQ; co-author of 'The Age of AI' with Henry Kissinger; net worth $53B
notable_achievements: CEO of Google during its most transformative decade
Chaired US National Security Commission on AI
Co-authored 'The Age of AI' with Henry Kissinger

speakers.name: Andrej Karpathy
speakers.title: Founder
speakers.bio: OpenAI co-founder; former Director of AI at Tesla where he built Autopilot; created Stanford's legendary cs231n deep learning course; coined 'vibe coding'; PhD Stanford under Fei-Fei Li
notable_achievements: Director of AI at Tesla, built Autopilot

speakers.name: Dr. Stephen Wolfram
speakers.title: Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Created Mathematica and Wolfram Alpha; youngest MacArthur Fellow at 21; PhD theoretical physics from Caltech at age 20; worked alongside Richard Feynman; pioneered cellular automata; authored 'A New Kind of Science'

speakers.name: Garry Tan
speakers.title: President & CEO
speakers.bio: CEO of Y Combinator since 2023; co-founded Initialized Capital; co-founded Posterous (acquired by Twitter); early employee at Palantir; Stanford CS

speakers.name: Joscha Bach
speakers.title: Executive Director
speakers.bio: Renowned AI researcher and philosopher of mind; former MIT Media Lab; created MicroPsi cognitive architecture; PhD cognitive science from Osnabruck; known for groundbreaking work on consciousness and AGI
notable_achievements: Executive Director, CA Institute for Machine Consciousness

speakers.name: Ben Mann
speakers.title: Co-Founder
speakers.bio: Co-founder of Anthropic (Claude, $60B+ valuation); one of the architects of GPT-3 at OpenAI; left OpenAI because 'safety wasn't the top priority'; Columbia CS
notable_achievements: Tech lead for product engineering at Anthropic

speakers.name: Robin Rombach
speakers.title: Co-Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Creator of Stable Diffusion; co-invented latent diffusion models; former Research Director at Stability AI; raised $300M Series B for Black Forest Labs; PhD LMU Munich
notable_achievements: Founded Black Forest Labs ($300M Series B)

speakers.name: Elad Gil
speakers.title: Investor
speakers.bio: Early investor in Airbnb, Stripe, Coinbase, Figma, Notion, Perplexity, Mistral, Character.ai; co-founder of Color Health; former VP Twitter; early Google (Android acquisition); author 'High Growth Handbook'; PhD MIT
notable_achievements: Early investor in Airbnb, Stripe, Coinbase, Figma, Perplexity

speakers.name: Tri Dao
speakers.title: Chief Scientist / Assistant Professor
speakers.bio: Invented Flash Attention (used by LLaMA, Falcon, MPT, etc.); Chief Scientist at Together AI; Assistant Professor at Princeton; Flash Attention 3 achieves 1.2 PFLOPS on H100; PhD Stanford under Chris Re

speakers.name: Harrison Chase
speakers.title: Co-Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Co-founder & CEO of LangChain (20M+ installations, most popular LLM framework); launched LangSmith and LangGraph; raised $30M from Benchmark and Sequoia; former ML lead at Robust Intelligence; Harvard stats/CS

speakers.name: Amjad Masad
speakers.title: Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Founder & CEO of Replit ($3B valuation, $250M raise, $100M+ ARR); built tools used by millions of developers; former Facebook (JavaScript infrastructure, built Babel, Jest); vision to enable 1 billion developers

speakers.name: Adam D'Angelo
speakers.title: CEO
speakers.bio: CEO of Quora; OpenAI board member (only one to survive Nov 2023 crisis, brokered Altman's return); first CTO of Facebook; built Synapse Media Player with Mark Zuckerberg in high school; founded Poe (chatbot aggregator)

speakers.name: Conor White-Sullivan
speakers.title: Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Founder & CEO of Roam Research (pioneered bi-directional linking, tools-for-thought movement); built for AI safety researchers (MIRI, CEA, CSER); former co-founder of HuffPost Labs (reported to Arianna Huffington); sold Localocracy to AOL

speakers.name: Emad Mostaque
speakers.title: Founder
speakers.bio: Co-founder of Stability AI; funded and released Stable Diffusion (open source); raised $101M at $1B valuation; resigned as CEO March 2024 to pursue decentralized AI; Oxford MA mathematics/CS

speakers.name: Edward Hu
speakers.title: Founder
speakers.bio: Invented LoRA at Microsoft (2021, now ubiquitous for fine-tuning); co-invented muTransfer; collaborated with OpenAI on GPT-3; 29K+ citations; PhD candidate under Yoshua Bengio (Turing Award); former OpenAI researcher

speakers.name: Jim Fan
speakers.title: Director of AI & Distinguished Scientist
speakers.bio: Director of AI at NVIDIA; co-lead of Project GR00T (humanoid robotics); created Voyager (GPT-4 agent that plays Minecraft); created MineDojo (NeurIPS 2022 Outstanding Paper); OpenAI's first intern; PhD Stanford under Fei-Fei Li

speakers.name: Joshua Meier
speakers.title: Co-Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Co-founder of Chai Discovery ($1.3B valuation, Eli Lilly partnership); developed ESM1 (first transformer protein model) at Meta AI; former OpenAI; started biotech at 16
notable_achievements: Founded Chai Discovery ($1.3B, Eli Lilly deal)

speakers.name: Jacob Kimmel
speakers.title: Co-Founder & President
speakers.bio: Co-founder of NewLimit (longevity biotech, close to first clinic-bound medicine); former PI at Calico Life Sciences; pioneered epigenetic reprogramming; PhD stem cell biology UCSF
notable_achievements: Former PI at Calico Life Sciences

speakers.name: Bernardino Romera Paredes
speakers.title: Research Scientist
speakers.bio: Lead author of FunSearch (Nature 2023) - first LLM to make new mathematical discoveries; discovered new solutions to cap set problem; PhD UCL

speakers.name: Ameya Velingker
speakers.title: Research Scientist
speakers.bio: Key contributor to AlphaProof (IMO silver medal 2024); co-author of AlphaProof Nature paper; developed Exphormer; PhD Carnegie Mellon

speakers.name: Div Garg
speakers.title: Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Founder of AGI Inc (97.4% on AndroidWorld benchmark); previously co-founded MultiOn ($30M+); Stanford PhD dropout; created Stanford CS 25: Transformers United; previously Nvidia, Google AI, Apple

speakers.name: Jeremy Nixon
speakers.title: Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Founder of Omniscience and AGI House; created first public Book Generator and Research Generator; former Google Brain; Harvard Applied Mathematics

speakers.name: Andrew White
speakers.title: Co-Founder & Head of Science
speakers.bio: Co-founder of Future House (AI scientists); created ChemCrow (first LLM chemistry agents), PaperQA (superhuman literature agent); OpenAI GPT-4 red team; Associate Professor U of Rochester

speakers.name: Yusuf Roohani
speakers.title: Associate Director of ML
speakers.bio: Leading Arc Institute Virtual Cell project; created GEARS (Nature Biotech 2023); launched Arc Virtual Cell Atlas (300M+ cells); PhD Stanford (Leskovec, Quake)

speakers.name: Fred Parietti
speakers.title: Co-Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Co-founder of Multiply Labs (74% cell therapy cost reduction via robotics); developing humanoids with NVIDIA; partnerships with AstraZeneca, UCSF; PhD Robotics MIT; 10 patents

speakers.name: Steve Taub
speakers.title: Senior Commercialization Advisor
speakers.bio: Senior Commercialization Advisor at DARPA; former Partner at In-Q-Tel; former MD at GE Ventures, JetBlue Tech Ventures; board observer Desktop Metal, Hyperloop One; MIT dual masters

speakers.name: David Vernal
speakers.title: Former Director of Intelligence
speakers.bio: Former Director of Intelligence for 16th Air Force (60K-person info warfare command); retired Colonel, 27 years; NSC (Obama admin); Stanford GSB, Harvard

speakers.name: Zal Bilimoria
speakers.title: Founding Partner
speakers.bio: Solo GP at Refactor Capital ($225M AUM); 4 unicorns including Solugen; former Partner a16z (launched Bio Fund); 10 years product at Google, Netflix, LinkedIn

speakers.name: Jerry Liu
speakers.title: Co-Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Co-founder & CEO of LlamaIndex (leading RAG framework); previously at Uber (ML platform); helping developers build LLM applications with data

speakers.name: Robert Nishihara
speakers.title: Co-Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Co-founder & CEO of Anyscale; co-created Ray (distributed computing framework used by OpenAI, Uber, etc.); PhD UC Berkeley under Michael Jordan

speakers.name: Erik Bernhardsson
speakers.title: Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Founder & CEO of Modal (serverless compute for AI/ML); created Spotify's music recommendation system (Annoy library); former VP Engineering at Better.com

speakers.name: Swyx
speakers.title: Founder
speakers.bio: Founder of Latent Space (top AI podcast/newsletter); created AI Engineer profession; founder of smol.ai; former DX at Vercel, Netlify, Temporal; AWS, Two Sigma alum

speakers.name: Grimes
speakers.title: Musician / AI Artist
speakers.bio: Grammy-nominated musician and producer; pioneer in AI-generated music; released NPC_AI persona; exploring AI x art intersection; former partner of Elon Musk

speakers.name: Rob Haisfield
speakers.title: Co-Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Co-founder & CEO of Websim (AI world simulation); leading hyperstition and world-building AI movement; formerly tools-for-thought researcher

speakers.name: Rafael Rafailov
speakers.title: Researcher
speakers.bio: First author of DPO (Direct Preference Optimization) - widely used alternative to RLHF; Stanford PhD candidate; DPO used by many open-source models
notable_achievements: DPO widely adopted as RLHF alternative

speakers.name: Karan Goel
speakers.title: Co-Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Co-founder & CEO of Cartesia (state space models for speech); building next-gen speech synthesis; Stanford PhD

speakers.name: AJ Keller
speakers.title: Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Founder & CEO of Neurosity (brain-computer interfaces); building Crown headset for focus and productivity; democratizing neurotechnology

speakers.name: Mike Heller
speakers.title: Partner
speakers.bio: Partner at Floodgate (first new partner in decade); former Expert-in-Residence First Round Capital; first GTM at Clearbit (30x ARR); advised 30+ startups

speakers.name: Evan Conrad
speakers.title: CEO & Co-Founder
speakers.bio: CEO of SF Compute ($300M valuation, $40M Series A); manages $100M+ GPU hardware; Airbnb for compute; former OpenAI, Segment

speakers.name: Kelly Peng
speakers.title: Founder, CEO & Co-CTO
speakers.bio: Founder of Kura Technologies (150-degree FOV AR glasses); 2x CES Innovation Award; Forbes 30 Under 30; 10+ patents; UC Berkeley EECS

speakers.name: Wachi Bandara
speakers.title: Head of AI
speakers.bio: Head of AI at DRW (major trading firm); serial founder with exits; led $2M DRW Foundation gift to Caltech for AI; former Mellon Capital
notable_achievements: Head of AI at DRW Trading
Led DRW Foundation gift to Caltech

speakers.name: Ben Kohlmann
speakers.title: CEO
speakers.bio: CEO of New American Industrial Alliance; Partner at Cubit Capital; retired Navy Commander, F/A-18 pilot, 32 combat missions; founded CNO Rapid Innovation Cell; Stanford GSB

speakers.name: Sophia Lugo
speakers.title: Co-Founder, CEO & Chairman
speakers.bio: Co-founder of Radar Therapeutics (smart mRNA with Jim Collins); SF Business Times 40 Under 40; 2024 Founder of the Year; Stanford GSB, Harvard '17

speakers.name: Jacob Rinaldi
speakers.title: Co-Founder & CSO
speakers.bio: Co-founder of Noetik ($50M GSK deal); built OCTO-VirtualCell foundation models; former Head of Oncology at Recursion; Stanford PhD

speakers.name: Atray Dixit
speakers.title: Co-Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Co-founder of Oncko; developed Perturb-seq at Broad Institute (Aviv Regev lab); former VP Tech at Gordian; PhD MIT

speakers.name: Richa Sharma
speakers.title: Founder
speakers.bio: Founder of QEM Labs (AI physics engine); created Gauss v1; quantum physicist; former OpenAI; PhD Physics Emory

speakers.name: Adam Green
speakers.title: Founder
speakers.bio: Founder of Markov Biosciences (biological simulators for drug discovery); scaling hypothesis in biology; Washington University

speakers.name: Jamie Joyce
speakers.title: Founder & Executive Director
speakers.bio: Founder of The Society Library; worked with OpenAI on ChatGPT governance; former Internet Archive, Wikitongues; UN representative

speakers.name: Dmitry Pimenov
speakers.title: Product Lead
speakers.bio: Product Lead for gpt-oss at OpenAI (open-weight reasoning models); former Stripe, Webflow, Facebook

speakers.name: Andy Zhou
speakers.title: Co-Founder
speakers.bio: Co-founder of Intology; built Zochi (first AI Scientist with ACL 2025 main track publication); 3 NeurIPS 2024 papers; PhD candidate CMU

speakers.name: Xiangyi Li
speakers.title: Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Founder of BenchFlow (60+ AI benchmarks); backed by Jeff Dean; former Tesla engineer

speakers.name: Noah Lofquist
speakers.title: CEO & Co-Founder
speakers.bio: CEO of Tzafon at 22 ($9.7M from HV Capital, OpenAI and xAI angels); building Lightcone; team from DeepMind, Palantir, Character AI
notable_achievements: Backed by OpenAI and xAI angels

speakers.name: Akira Nishii
speakers.title: PhD Student / Investor
speakers.bio: Stanford Biomedical Data Science PhD (QUAD Fellow); former CEO of Perch; ML engineer at 2seventy bio (Regeneron)

speakers.name: Brett Goldstein
speakers.title: Founder & CEO
speakers.bio: Founder of Micro (backed by a16z, Balaji); co-founded Launch House; former Clearbit, Google; Berkeley cognitive science researcher

speakers.name: Margarita Groisman
speakers.title: CEO & Co-Founder
speakers.bio: CEO of Aravolta (YC, $5.1M); former Microsoft (data center operations); building AI-native DCIM

speakers.name: Jonathan Lacoste
speakers.title: Founder & GP
speakers.bio: Founder of Space VC ($20M Fund II, invested in SpaceX); raised VC at 19; co-founded Jebbit (Vista acquisition); Top 50 Emerging VCs

speakers.name: Cassandra Carothers
speakers.title: Managing Partner
speakers.bio: Managing Partner at Departure Capital (frontier tech: quantum, aerospace, robotics); mentor at Creative Destruction Lab

speakers.name: Asher Dayanim
speakers.title: Enterprise/Sovereign AI
speakers.bio: Leading Cerebras for Nations (sovereign AI for governments); built models for Arabic, Hindi, Kazakh

speakers.name: Nikila Ravi
speakers.title: Research Scientist
speakers.bio: First author of Segment Anything (SAM); Research Scientist at Meta AI; revolutionized image segmentation

tiers.2: Notable founders/researchers with major achievements (22 people)
tiers.3: Rising stars and industry leaders (31 people)
